author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...FLOSSIE STRENGTHENS SOME MORE OFFSHORE SOUTHWEST MEXICO...
summary: ...FLOSSIE STRENGTHENS SOME MORE OFFSHORE SOUTHWEST MEXICO... As of 12:00 AM CST Tue Jul 01 the center of Flossie was located near 16.5, -104.7 with movement WNW at 10 mph. The minimum central pressure was 984 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 80 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...FLOSSIE STRENGTHENS SOME MORE OFFSHORE SOUTHWEST MEXICO... As of 12:00 AM CST Tue Jul 01 the center of Flossie was located near 16.5, -104.7 with movement WNW at 10 mph. The minimum central pressure was 984 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 80 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Flossie (EP1/EP062025)
